comment: /**  * Set the URL of this remote accessor's target service.  * The URL must be compatible with the rules of the particular remoting provider.  */
code: /**  * Set the URL of this remote accessor's target service.  * The URL must be compatible with the rules of the particular remoting provider.  */ public void setServiceUrl(String serviceUrl) {     this.serviceUrl = serviceUrl. }

comment: /**  * Return the URL of this remote accessor's target service.  */
code: /**  * Return the URL of this remote accessor's target service.  */ public String getServiceUrl() {     return this.serviceUrl. }
@Override public void afterPropertiesSet() {     if (getServiceUrl() == null) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Property 'serviceUrl' is required").     } }
